doc:
John Bonica https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Bonica 0 John Joseph Bonica (February 16, 1917 – August 15, 1994) was a Sicilian American anesthesiologist and professional wrestler known as the founding father of the discipline of pain medicine. John_Joseph_Bonica ( February_16_,_1917 – August_15_,_1994 ) was a_Sicilian_American_anesthesiologist_and_professional_wrestler known as the_founding_father of the_discipline of pain_medicine .
